Banner.Description: I have 2 years of experience developing applications, components, sdk's, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Javscript, Angular, React applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Versatile Frontend Developer with 2 years of experience in designing, developing, and implementing scalable and responsive enterprise-level applications with a configurable approach.
I specialize in creating framework components for easy and quick development, while also maintaining a strong focus on creating exceptional user experiences.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend developer
Description: Developed secure and tested codebase for 5+ web products using JavaScript, Angular, and React ensuring structure and reliability.
Integrated dashboard components, increasing streaming efficiency across multiple social media platforms and plugins (e.g., Stripe, Shopify, Chart.js, Mogi.io).
Independently engineered a 1:1 SDK, leveraging libraries such as Peer.js, Socket.IO, and RxJS, for one-to-one video interactions.
Increased user engagement using Web API services like Push Notification, Geolocation, and MediaRecorder.
Implemented REST API services on the client side, conducting comprehensive CRUD operation testing with tools such as Postman, ensuring a 99% success rate.
Implemented security through JWT implementation and improved performance via Lazy Loading techniques.
Optimized development processes using SDLC, Agile, GIT, and Jira, boosting collaboration efficiency and enhancing deliverable quality.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend intern
Description: Gained proficiency in extensive development and testing processes while mastering a range of Leadership Principles.
Boosted frontend project contributions through practical expertise in React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Evaluated 10+ end-to-end designs for performance complexity, scalability, quality, and security.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Live B2B Platform
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: One single dashboard helps brands manage their content and product advertising through live streaming on social media handles by providing analytics of engagement, CTAs, leads, and sales data.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Live Tv SDK
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A client-side SDK can be added to a brand's website or mobile application to broadcast live streaming of product advertisements. It showcases custom and Shopify-imported products and includes an analytics tracker.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: 1:1 SDK
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This SDK is used for various use cases, such as customer support, technician-engineer communication, and more. The SDK offers features like real-time recording, call routing, adding participants, call analytics, and more.

OtherProjects.Title: Other projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Multi User Drawing Board
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A collaborative real-time drawing app for multiple users to paint together in shared virtual rooms.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Event Management
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Interactive event app enabling real-time engagement, quizzes, and winner announcements between event managers and participants.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Shop Management System
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Empower shop owners with efficient customer management, transaction tracking, dues monitoring, and purchase recording tools in one application

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Appoitment Booking Web App
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a React app for seamless patient-doctor appointment scheduling, integrating WhatsApp and email notifications for efficient communication and confirmation.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Id Card Generator
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: a web-based ID printing app, extracting employee data from Excel files to print customized employee ID cards.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: SEO Optimized Website
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: React business website with SEO focus, integrated Google Analytics for data-driven insights on user engagement and conversions.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
